languages.text: {n}На губах Джай возникает кривая улыбка.{/n} "Два мошенника, что водят всех за нос? Принцесса хладного торга и Вольный Торговец, как будто из слезливой сказочки для созревающих дев. Но есть за мной тайный грешок — я люблю такие сказочки".

{n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."
languages.original_text: {n}На губах Джай возникает кривая улыбка.{/n} "Два мошенника, что водят всех за нос? Принцесса хладного торга и Вольный Торговец, как будто из слезливой сказочки для созревающих дев. Но есть за мной тайный грешок — я люблю такие сказочки".

languages.text: {n}婕伊的脸上露出了狡猾的笑容。{/n}“在两个骗子的带领下，所有人都跳起了欢快的舞蹈？冷市公主与行商浪人……这简直就像是矫揉造作的言情故事，专门哄骗那些即将成人的小姑娘一样。不过我得承认我的怪癖，我就是喜欢这样的故事。”
languages.original_text: {n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊的脸上露出了狡猾的笑容。{/n}“在两个骗子的带领下，所有人都跳起了欢快的舞蹈？冷市公主与行商浪人……这简直就像是矫揉造作的言情故事，专门哄骗那些即将成人的小姑娘一样。不过我得承认我的怪癖，我就是喜欢这样的故事。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの顔に歪んだ笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「二人の詐欺師が皆を陽気なダンスに誘う？冷たき取引の王女自由開拓者が…まるで、女になりたての女の子向けのお伽噺のようじゃない。言っておかないといけないね…あたし、この手の話が大好きなんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの顔に歪んだ笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「二人の詐欺師が皆を陽気なダンスに誘う？冷たき取引の王女自由開拓者が…まるで、女になりたての女の子向けのお伽噺のようじゃない。言っておかないといけないね…あたし、この手の話が大好きなんだ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa de complicidad aparece en el rostro de Jae.{/n} «¿Dos {mf|timadores|timadoras} haciendo de las suyas? La Princesa del Comercio Frío y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente... parece algo salido de uno de esos relatos sensibleros que les cuentan a las muchachas en edad de merecer. Debo confesar una de mis vergüenzas: me encantan ese tipo de relatos».
languages.original_text: {n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa de complicidad aparece en el rostro de Jae.{/n} «¿Dos {mf|timadores|timadoras} haciendo de las suyas? La Princesa del Comercio Frío y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente... parece algo salido de uno de esos relatos sensibleros que les cuentan a las muchachas en edad de merecer. Debo confesar una de mis vergüenzas: me encantan ese tipo de relatos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sourire taquin s'immisce sur le visage de Jae.{/n} « Comme deux fripouilles qui mènent tout le monde en bateau ? La princesse du Commerce Froid et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}... On croirait le titre d'une mièvrerie pour jeunes filles fraîchement pubères. Je dois d'ailleurs vous avouer ce minuscule péché : j'adore ce genre d'histoires. »
languages.original_text: {n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire taquin s'immisce sur le visage de Jae.{/n} « Comme deux fripouilles qui mènent tout le monde en bateau ? La princesse du Commerce Froid et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}... On croirait le titre d'une mièvrerie pour jeunes filles fraîchement pubères. Je dois d'ailleurs vous avouer ce minuscule péché : j'adore ce genre d'histoires. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein schiefes Lächeln taucht auf Jaes Gesicht auf.{/n} "Zwei {mf|Betrüger|Betrügerinnen}, die alle um sich an der Nase herumführen? Die Prinzessin des Kalthandels und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ... klingt nach einer gefühlsseligen Geschichte für junge Frauen. Ich muss gestehen, ich habe etwas übrig für solche Geschichten."
languages.original_text: {n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein schiefes Lächeln taucht auf Jaes Gesicht auf.{/n} "Zwei {mf|Betrüger|Betrügerinnen}, die alle um sich an der Nase herumführen? Die Prinzessin des Kalthandels und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ... klingt nach einer gefühlsseligen Geschichte für junge Frauen. Ich muss gestehen, ich habe etwas übrig für solche Geschichten."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın yüzünde çarpık bir gülümseme peyda oluyor.{/n} "Herkesi neşeli bir dansa kaldıran iki dümenci ha? Soğuk Ticaret Prensesi ve Hür Tacir... Kadınlığa girmek üzere olan genç kızlara anlatılan acıklı hikâyelerden fırlama gibi. Bir zaafımı itiraf etmem gerek: Böyle hikâyeleri çok severim."
languages.original_text: {n}A crooked smile appears on Jae's face.{/n} "Two swindlers leading everyone else on a merry dance? The Princess of the Cold Trade and the Rogue Trader... it's like something out of a mawkish story for girls on the cusp of womanhood. I must confess a peccadillo of mine — I love those kinds of stories."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın yüzünde çarpık bir gülümseme peyda oluyor.{/n} "Herkesi neşeli bir dansa kaldıran iki dümenci ha? Soğuk Ticaret Prensesi ve Hür Tacir... Kadınlığa girmek üzere olan genç kızlara anlatılan acıklı hikâyelerden fırlama gibi. Bir kusurumu itiraf etmem gerek: Bu tip hikâyeleri çok severim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
